schema.description: Request to update tenant passwordless policy.

enabled_methods.description:
Which passwordless methods are enabled.
Valid values: "disabled", "`magic_link_only`", "`otp_only`", "`all_methods`".

magic_link_expiry_minutes.description: Magic link expiry in minutes (must be > 0).

require_mfa_after_passwordless.description: Whether MFA is required after passwordless authentication.
